verses.text: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w charge|strong="G1263"\w* \add thee\add* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, who \w shall|strong="G3195"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* the \w quick|strong="G2198"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w at|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w appearing|strong="G2015"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w*;

\w Preach|strong="G2784"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w*; be \w instant|strong="G2186"\w* in \w season|strong="G2122"\w*, out of \w season|strong="G0171"\w*; \w reprove|strong="G1651"\w*, \w rebuke|strong="G2008"\w*, \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w longsuffering|strong="G3115"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w* will \w come|strong="G2071"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* they \w will|strong="G0430"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w endure|strong="G0430"\w* \w sound|strong="G5198"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w after|strong="G2596"\w* their \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w* shall they \w heap|strong="G2002"\w* to \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w teachers|strong="G1320"\w*, having \w itching|strong="G2833"\w* \w ears|strong="G0189"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they shall turn \w away|strong="G0654"\w* \add their\add* \w ears|strong="G0189"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* shall be \w turned|strong="G1624"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w fables|strong="G3454"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w watch|strong="G3525"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, endure \w afflictions|strong="G2553"\w*, \w do|strong="G4160"\w* the \w work|strong="G2041"\w* of an \w evangelist|strong="G2099"\w*, make full \w proof|strong="G4135"\w* of \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G4689"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* ready to be \w offered|strong="G4689"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w* of \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w departure|strong="G0359"\w* is at \w hand|strong="G2186"\w*.

I have \w fought|strong="G0075"\w* a \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w fight|strong="G0073"\w*, I have \w finished|strong="G5055"\w* \add my\add* \w course|strong="G1408"\w*, I have \w kept|strong="G5083"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*:

\w Henceforth|strong="G3063"\w* there is laid \w up|strong="G0606"\w* for \w me|strong="G3427"\w* a \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, the \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w* \w judge|strong="G2923"\w*, shall \w give|strong="G0591"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to \w me|strong="G1698"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* unto \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w them|strong="G0025"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* that \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w appearing|strong="G2015"\w*.
Do thy \w diligence|strong="G4704"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w shortly|strong="G5030"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Demas|strong="G1214"\w* hath \w forsaken|strong="G1459"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*, having \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w present|strong="G3568"\w* \w world|strong="G0165"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* is \w departed|strong="G4198"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Thessalonica|strong="G2332"\w*; \w Crescens|strong="G2913"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galatia|strong="G1053"\w*, \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Dalmatia|strong="G1149"\w*.

\w Only|strong="G3441"\w* \w Luke|strong="G3065"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*. \w Take|strong="G0353"\w* \w Mark|strong="G3138"\w*, \w and|strong="G0353"\w* \w bring|strong="G0071"\w* him \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w thee|strong="G4572"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w profitable|strong="G2173"\w* to \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w*.
\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Tychicus|strong="G5190"\w* have I \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*.

The \w cloke|strong="G5341"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* I \w left|strong="G0620"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Troas|strong="G5174"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w Carpus|strong="G2591"\w*, when thou \w comest|strong="G2064"\w*, \w bring|strong="G5342"\w* \add with thee\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w books|strong="G0975"\w*, \add but\add* \w especially|strong="G3122"\w* the \w parchments|strong="G3200"\w*.

\w Alexander|strong="G0223"\w* the \w coppersmith|strong="G5471"\w* \w did|strong="G1731"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*: the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w reward|strong="G0591"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*:

\w Of|strong="G5442"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* be \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w ware|strong="G5442"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w hath|strong="G0436"\w* \w greatly|strong="G3029"\w* \w withstood|strong="G0436"\w* \w our|strong="G2251"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*.

\w At|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w answer|strong="G0627"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* stood \w with|strong="G4836"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add men\add* \w forsook|strong="G1459"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*: \add I pray God\add* that it \w may|strong="G3049"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* be \w laid|strong="G3049"\w* to their \w charge|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Notwithstanding|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w stood|strong="G3936"\w* with \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strengthened|strong="G1743"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w* the \w preaching|strong="G2782"\w* might be fully \w known|strong="G4135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add that\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* might \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I was \w delivered|strong="G4506"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* of the \w lion|strong="G3023"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* shall \w deliver|strong="G4506"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w evil|strong="G4190"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* will \w preserve|strong="G4982"\w* \add me\add* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w heavenly|strong="G2032"\w* \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w*: to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \add be\add* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w Salute|strong="G0782"\w* \w Prisca|strong="G4251"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Aquila|strong="G0207"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w household|strong="G3624"\w* of \w Onesiphorus|strong="G3683"\w*.

\w Erastus|strong="G2037"\w* \w abode|strong="G3306"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Corinth|strong="G2882"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w Trophimus|strong="G5161"\w* have I \w left|strong="G0620"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Miletum|strong="G3399"\w* \w sick|strong="G0770"\w*.

Do thy \w diligence|strong="G4704"\w* to \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w winter|strong="G5494"\w*. \w Eubulus|strong="G2103"\w* \w greeteth|strong="G0782"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pudens|strong="G4227"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Linus|strong="G3044"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Claudia|strong="G2803"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*.

The \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*. \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*. The second \add epistle\add* unto Timotheus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Ephesians, was written from Rome, when Paul was brought before Nero the second time.
